msg: Use limit of 4GB for document PUT requests, instead of the MochiWeb default of 1MB. Closes COUCHDB-37.

msg: Fix for file attachments using too much space in compacted databases

msg: Enable Etag processing for document GET requests that include the '?rev' query string parameter.
